page.title: 13FULFORTH FARM P4
page.content: The machiney used includes 4 tractors,plough,cultivator,disc harrow,rollers, grass cutter,baler,bale carrier,muck spreader and loader and combine harvester. THe stock are mainly cattle and sheep.There are 250 breeding ewes, mules (swaledale ewe;Blue-faced Leicester ram).The ewes are kept for about 5 years.They hope to get about 1.75 lambs per ewe on average.The sheep are drenched 3 times a year and dipped twice. once 3 weeks after shearing which takes place in June and once in Sept/Oct.The dipping is inspected by the ministry vets and is to control scab and fly. There are about 40 cattle-a Hereford cross for beef.A beef bull is hired for about 10 weeks in June to serve the cows.
